resources.string: We need screen overlay permission to overlay the screen, so even Youtube cannot detect it

string-array.name: advices
string-array.item: Select the ring below to change color
Press start service to start overlapping display, tap 2x to expand to whole screen
Press start in app to use it as temporary background
If the app isn\'t working correctly, please let me know on Facebook below
This app can drain your battery when using LCD display. Please make sure, that you have OLED.
The phone is NOT locked when the app is in use, so anyone can access it!
You can also use tints in notifications area. Just add it from button list.
To prevent burning OLED displays, do not let any color (except black) on the screen for a longer period of time
